control.label: Show Icons on Classic or Vertical Homescreen Only
Round corners for music in widgets/visulisation
Show fanart on video info screen
Do not show divider lines on video info screen

control.description: Show scrolling visual text in Music OSD
control.label: Show scrolling visual text in Music OSD

control.description: Show music info always in Music OSD
control.label: Show music info always in Music OSD

control.description: Always show osd info/controls in music visualisation

control.label: Hide Spoilers for unwatched TV Shows
Show episode poster for next up
